title: takes car in for repairs...
body:
My sway bar links needed to be replaced, was causing some rattling. Belle tire quoted me $857 saying my struts were leaking. My ride and handling is still perfect, and there were no real signs of strut issues... looked at the pricing to notice the strut issue was $720 of the cost, most of which is labor from spring and other parr removal... i paid $130 for swaybars to be replaced and went on my merry way.

Even car repair chains try to upsell. my car drives perfect now. And I am not out $720 for litterally nothing.

knowledge is power? No, knowledge is money
